casebody.data:
K & J SUPPLY, LLC, et al.
v.
MULTI-CHEM GROUP, LLC, et al. 17-992
consolidated with 17-985
17-986
17-987
17-988
17-989
17-990
17-991 Court of Appeal of Louisiana, Third Circuit. July 11, 2018 Richard G. Duplantier, Jr., Galloway, Johnson, Tompkins, Burr & Smith, 701 Poydras Street, Suite 4040, New Orleans, LA 70139, (504) 525-6802, COUNSEL FOR DEFENDANTS/APPELLANTS: Multi-Chem Group, LLC, Cade Bourque, John Gauthier, Nathan Walker, Aaron Gauthier Edward Paul Landry, 211 East Main Street, New Iberia, LA 70560, (337) 364-7626, COUNSEL FOR PLAINTIFFS/APPELLEES: K & J Supply, LLC, et al. L. Clayton Burgess, 605 W. Congress Street, Lafayette, LA 70501, (337) 234-7573, COUNSEL FOR PLAINTIFFS/APPELLEES: K & J Supply, LLC, et al. Court composed of Marc T. Amy, Van H. Kyzar, and Candyce G. Perret, Judges. AMY, Judge.

For the reasons provided in the consolidated appeal of Robert J. Broussard, et al. v. Multi-Chem Group, LLC , 17-985 (La.App. 3 Cir. 7/11/18) , --- So.3d ----, the judgment of the trial court is affirmed. Costs of this proceeding are assessed to the defendants-appellants, Multi-Chem Group, LLC, Cade Bourque, John Gauthier, Nathan Walker, and Aaron Gauthier.

AFFIRMED.
